main event: An unknown metallic object was observed hovering in the sky over Tulsa, Oklahoma on December 6, 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as disc-shaped and metallic in appearance,The sighting occurred around 4:45 PM,The object hovered for several minutes before accelerating and disappearing,There were no sounds reported associated with the object,The sighting was reported to the Air Force and investigated as part of Project Blue Book.
